root.str: Rapidly recharging jump jets allow the user to reach areas far out of jumping range
Do you love goooooooold? Empire specific items in this bundle have VS, NC, and TR equivalents.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Lightning. VS use only.
Increases the overall handling of the Flash by 15%.

Territories owned by your empire automatically generate resources for you periodically. Only territories that connect to the warpgate through friendly territories will generate resources. The periodic resource amounts are displayed on the %0.
Applies a cosmetic attachment to your vehicle. TR only.
See what's new in the Depot!

BASTION COMPONENT
Rearms and refuels your Bastion Fleet Carrier.
Requires Bastion Asset crafting permissions.

Required to summon Bastion Fleet Carrier.
Attach a smoke grenade launcher to your weapon
Customize your Flash with the Bracer Guard. NC use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 13 minutes.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 35 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Form Over Function Bundle Grant Items
Squad members show on the map as colored circles.
Always fond of trinkets, Representative Ayla of Nanite Systems reaches out for assistance in gathering materials needed to synthesize a piece of fine jewelry.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Mosquito.

BASTION COMPONENT
Restocks response vehicles and prepares the hangar bay.
Requires Bastion Asset crafting permissions.

Required to summon Bastion Fleet Carrier.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Did you know that Hossin was the first continent to experience a "real" death since the Auraxian War began in earnest? This was due to an unstable Warpgate datamatrix, resulting in corrupted biological data. Sound familiar?
Insufficient privileges to speak in this chat channel.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Hood Ornament. VS use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. TR use only.
We love the smell of sales on the Depot in the morning.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> We will periodically release mining drills from orbit when combat isn't too severe. You'll simply need to use the mining laser on the crystalized materials to recover them.
Kill the enemy with C4 presents
Death on the battlefield in service to your empire is the greatest glory you can achieve in your life. NC use only.
All empires are welcome aboard Sanctuary satellites. Soldiers take their rest, non-combatants live in peace, and merchants sell their wares.
Battle experience also earns you resources. The type of resource earned is determined by which territory you are in. Fighting in an aerospace territory will earn you aerospace resources, for example.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your weapon.
Allows 2 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Improved cruising and afterburner speed. (More effective than previous rank)
This customization adds a Green Olive decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Requires a completed Expedition: Synthium in the Armory.
Hack the lock to disable the force field temporarily
Outfit invite failed. Player must be at least Battle Rank 6.

Combat on Auraxis heats up as a new Summer directive enters the fray, and you'll find season-limited water pistols and water balloons in your loadouts to drench your enemies!

We've also added a new Heavy Assault primary weapon, the NS-03 Thumper grenade launcher, a classic weapon PlanetSide 1 veterans will remember, reimagined for PlanetSide 2!

Lastly, we've ironed out a lot of bugs that cropped up during DX11, we've refined the new spawn system, and we've added an all new continent event type, Maximum Pressure. Enjoy the heat!
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 shells.
The enemy is attacking a control node!
NC: Vehicle - Customization - Snake Decal Promo
Collect the Data Before Time Expires

You'd be out of your gourd to not rock this azure-eyed jack-o'-lantern helmet.
+10% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.
By default, your teammates all have friendly blue triangle indicators above their heads.
<font color="#FF0000">All available items have been slotted as construction components.</font>
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
NC: Vehicle - Customization - Skull & Crossbones Promo
Vehicle Purchase Timer I ABILITY Description
Acquire a Sunderer from any vehicle terminal.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Admin weapon that spawns NPCs where the bullet lands [WIP]
Enlistment failed - your outfit is on Outfit War probation.
Disrupts active lock-on missiles and blocks new lock-ons for 5 seconds. Can be activated once every 30 seconds.
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "F" Hood Ornament.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 0.25 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
The NC needs this facility, step it up!
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> I know it's not a perfect solution, but you'll want to put that on before you to go back into the storm.
One of your most important terminals is the Equipment Terminal. This terminal can be used to resupply ammunition, change your class, or to change what weapons you are using.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> Another location has been added to your map. A much larger signature has been identified, but it's weaker, too. Review this last area before returning.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 26 rockets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 rounds.
This device causes the Mosquito to drift into turns when at high speeds. To escape a drift, the pilot will have to use the afterburners or drop the speed and enter hover mode.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 440 rounds.
Discounts on the Gear You Need
Reduces the lock on time of the missile launcher by 9%.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal. Thanks for being a loyal player!
The ammo Dispenser dispenses ammo like it was a treat
Affectionately referred to as "The Boombox" by many NC soldiers, the Mjolnir's burst fire explosive rounds excel against armored targets in close quarters engagements.
Adds the Drifter style hubcaps to your Flash. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V6 Description(Delete Me -BB)

Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Apply the Clover camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 16.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the Thorn camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 56%.

003 Fins description. All factions can use this gear.

This custom-painted variant of the magazine-fed NS-R3 Swarm can switch between low velocity and high velocity rockets which lock onto both ground and air targets, allowing the user to tailor the weapon's tracking capabilities based on the engagement. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1500 rounds.
Apply the Thorn camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "I" Gold Hood Ornament.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
You are already the raid leader.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 800 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. I'm willing to part with some of my old fatigues if you drop planetside and spend some time piloting a Valkyrie. I've missed her since my crash on Oshur and would like to know that she's in good hands.

Damaging enemies now automatically spots them for you and allies, while kills from greater than 150 meters will clear spot checks on you and prevent new ones from being applied for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Protect your actual skull with this flaming violet skull helmet. Provides a +15% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.

We've released a massive update that completely revisits the <font color="#ACE1E5">Nanite Systems Operatives</font> faction, adding two new vehicles, expanding their infantry arsenal, and opening the faction up to all players <font color="#ACE1E5">FOR FREE</font>. Upon visiting Sanctuary after reaching BR20, you'll be offered a mission that will unlock the NSO faction for your account. Players with <font color="#ACE1E5">All Access Memberships</font> will now be able to align themselves with VS/NC/TR and join outfits on that faction, too! The <font color="#ACE1E5">Black Market</font> has also received a variety of new weapons, and new <font color="#ACE1E5">vehicle-centric missions</font> have been added to the mission pool as well.
Apply the Grey Scales camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Adds the Chrome Tubular Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
You have the maximum number of characters allowed.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
The planet Auraxis has been engaged in perpetual conflict since the Terran Republic's first colony was founded in 2643.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Usable by all factions.
Increases Merit & XP gains by 50% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 15% for 2 seconds.

Poorly placed construction objects can be deconstructed by equipping a Decon Tool from the ANT terminal. If a Silo is located nearby, only the Silo's owner and squadmates may deconstruct objects in the vicinity.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Vanguard. NC use only.
The Python AP is loaded with fast-moving armor-piercing rounds that are strong against armored targets, but have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.
Whenever you receive damage, 3% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Applies a loyalty decal to your armor or vehicle, celebrating eight years of PlanetSide 2.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Galaxy. All factions can use this gear.
While your personal shield is active, receiving small arms damage now heals 50 health immediately. This effect may only trigger once every 7.5 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420.
Adds the Chrome Hyena X Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 33 rockets.
The Medical Applicator has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.
Wearable by Heavy Assault. VS use only.
You only have a short time to get these sales from the depot, make it count!
Adds Hubcaps VS003 to your Sunderer. (DNT)
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
This customization adds a Olive decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Improved traction, turning, brakes and reverse speed.

There are currently no write jobs for video capture.
Soft Point Ammunition increases the weapon's maximum damage range by 5 meters, but reduces its projectile velocity by 10%.
Adds tire spikes to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Here is some gear to get you started!
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
C-4 can be unlocked on all non-Infiltrator and non-MAX infantry. Use it to take care of those pesky vehicles!
Improve the Lightning's rotation speed, reverse speed and braking power.
Awarded for mastery of the Harasser, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a badge of honor for the owner's offroad achievements.
A heavier airframe but stronger engine provides improved vertical thrust, pitch manueverability, and agility.
Cover objects are deployables such as walls and barricades; they are designed to withstand large amounts of damage
Fires your equipped weapon or use the equipped item.Kill three enemy target dummies.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
This 4th Anniversary Edition H-V45 was created with a focus on close quarters mobility. Its light weight does not slow the shooter as much as other weapons in its class. VS use only.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Engineer. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner</font> That is enough harvest for now, though I'm told you may still assist fellow field operatives if you wish. Please return to Sanctuary for a debrief when you have finished.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> That was close. Your vehicle was rigged to activate the Shattered Warpgate, and Foster was about to send you on a one-way trip. Oh, did he not tell you?
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield and 10% of your maximum ability energy.
Anchored Mode utility line has been refunded, and a new version has been integrated into all Prowlers by default.
Increases shield recharge rate and strength by a total of 20%.
Send a wave of repairs when your shield is depleted.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 420 seconds.
Apply this glowing decal to your armor.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 shells.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Prowler by 10%.

Satisfied with the data gathered thus far, Foster takes his leave, allowing hostilities to simmer without the guiding hand of Nanite Systems. With renewed purpose, empires work diligently to overcome the obstacles put in place by the upheaval, and begin formulating new strategies in the fight over the resource rich battlescape of Esamir.

Despite countless casualties in this war, we persevere. Our spawn matrix ensures that death is fleeting. Embrace the challenge, retake the lands of Auraxis, and unite them under our lawful rule once again.
Provide ample protection without excessively weighing down the user.

The Charged Proton EMP is a heavy-hitting electromagnetic pulse plasma cannon. EMP plasma rounds can only damage shields but will also disable enemy deployables such as land mines. This cannon requires a charge before it can be fired.
Single Use Esamir Snow Vehicle Camo
Welcome, acolyte. Our scientists continue to unlock the mysteries hidden among the chaos on Esamir, but their progress has been slowed by the continued interruptions of battle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48.
Improved traction, turning, brakes, and reverse speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Reduces the delay before a depleted overshield begins recharging by 60%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Before being retired during the early years of the war, the Suppressor was used for low-profile infiltration missions where engagements could take place in tight corridors.
Nice work, soldier. This information will be sent to Command for distribution. Why don't you put some lead down range at the Bio Labs so we don't arouse suspicion.
On the Head of a Pin
Voice and Chat - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
Combat operations successful. Report to Sanctuary for additional instruction.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys aircraft
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Vanguard. NC use only.
Deploy the Metal Detector on the Observation Deck
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> That's all we need for now, soldier. I.R.I.S. has dispatched teams to cover the other combat areas. Mission complete.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.
Once you have completed a directive tier, a <font color="#7ff4ff">new tier</font> will unlock with tougher requirements.
Increases the MAXes fire rate for a short period of time

This virtual training environment is ideal for weapon and vehicle practice. Unlike normal combat zones, in this area all weapons, attachments, and upgrades are available for use. Vehicles can also be created without resource cost or timers.
Target not beyond minimum 200 meter safe distance.
This customization adds a Digital decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Nanite based tool specialized to harvest Auraxium.
Follow your waypoint and step on the thrust pad.

Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Causes the HUD to highlight and track hostile aircraft at a range of 300 meters.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.75% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.

Applies the Innova Eagle Decal to your armor.
This is the outfit decal for Lux Eterna
Attaches a Focused Kobalt 50 Cal Coaxial Machine Gun to the Plasma Cannon. 50 Cal machine guns are effective against infantry targets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> Elysium drills are dropped on Indar, Esamir, 艾美瑞什 or Hossin. Head planetside and check your map to see if there is an active drill. Otherwise you will be notified when one is dropped.
Further improve the Magrider's strafe speed, reverse speed, braking power and hover power.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Brush camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The M20-W is a high-capacity variant of the standard M20 Mustang nosegun, meant for use specifically with interceptor setups of the Reaver VTOL fighter. NC use only.

Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.
This customization adds a Smiley Face decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Apply the Forest Ground camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Now that we've marked where we'll be going, close the map, and let's go get a vehicle.
Allows use of the long range 7x SO7 sniper scope.
Apply the Ink Spots camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Further increases the user's sprint speed while equipped.
This type of generator powers the shields that protect the Spawn Control Unit (SCU), which allows defenders to spawn within the facility.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rockets.
There's been a theory that Auraxis was terraformed into the planet it is today by the ancient Vanu. These recent discoveries have only backed this theory up.
Say 'Hi' to your alien god-thing for me.
Advanced calibration systems passively increase your maximum shield health by 50.
Return to your faction representative on Oshur
The anti-aircraft Phalanx Turret has excellent mid-air burst capabilities that have proven to be devastating against enemy air vehicles.
Your faction's victory has yielded a 20% aircraft discount on this continent!
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Harasser. VS use only.
Adds the Intake 003 to the Galaxy.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle that prevents lock-on attempts. Reuse time: 15 seconds.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Searchlights for your Sunderer. NC only.
Hides your radar signature from enemy detection devices.
Earn points by holding Jaeger's Crossing, Snowshear Watchtower, Northpoint Station, or Terran BL-4 Crash Site.

Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 25% resistance to incoming damage, this damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Unlock special Squad Leader-only tactical Certifications to help organize or support your squad.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Focusing on high rate of fire and deadly precision, Tomoe rewards headhunters, making it a desirable option for mid-range assassinations. All factions can use NS weapons.
While active, the Transport Cloak drains the ANT's stored Cortium in exchange for limited invisibility. Consumes 170 Cortium per second.
Outfit: Get 5 people to join your outfit
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Vanguard by 450 seconds.
Kill enemy players with the NSX Naginata.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 70%.

These degenerates are the <font color="#c27fff">Vanu Sovereignty</font>. They claim that the Vanu, a long-dead alien species, are the only true authority of Auraxis. We won't allow some xenophilic zealots overthrow our Republic that has kept the peace for centuries.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 rounds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 10%.
Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target. All factions can use this weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Our technicians would like more information on what is causing the storm on Esamir. A few of the older Amp Stations were initially used to monitor weather patterns on the continent, but the war created more pressing concerns.

The scientists of Nanite Systems have developed a neutralizing device, and offered to share it with us in return for our support. Neutralize the energy on the disabled vehicles, and bring them back safely.
Adds Hubcaps NC004 to your Sunderer. (DNT)

Greetings operative! Nanite Systems would like to extend its reach by co-opting the use of the antenna array atop Tower Outposts. We will mark relevant access points on your HUD. Rewards will be paid out upon mission completion. Thank you for your consideration!

Participating in this mission will temporarily flag you as a High Value agent of Nanite Systems.
Reduces weight penalty for heavy weapons.
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie on Esamir, travel more than 500m in a storm with at least 2 additional occupants inside.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 360 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 shells.

Failed to set the squad leader.
Now eliminate New Conglomerate and Terran Republic targets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Enlightened one, contact us the next time you are planning on visiting Esamir. We've solved the the security flaw and now need someone to repair the damage and remove any remaining saboteurs.
<font color="#00FFAA">Injured Researcher:</font> Bet you're here for the research, though. Disabling the rebirthing matrix of the rebels and the cultists? That was some big brain stuff.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2250 rounds.

This grenade simulates the sound of weapons fire, projects a false radar signature to enemies and will also distract automated anti-infantry turrets.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
Deploys a Caltrop tank trap that inhibits the movement of vehicles. Lasts 30 minutes or until destroyed. Up to four Caltrops can be active at a time.
Hey, nice job with them plants. Scientists got pretty excited when they saw the data, but they get excited over anything new these days.
Adds an additional 20 rounds to the magazine.
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Silver Medal
The NSP4x is a high quality 4x zoom scope designed specifically for use with the NS-44L Blackhand pistol.
TR Patriot Flare Gun Gold Medal

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> It's good to keep up relations, not biting the hand that feeds you and all that, but we've got some real work to take care of. I've sent new missions your way, let's make sure the Terran and Vanu aren't the only ones in this arms race.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
